All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Background
    Superclass of all backgrounds
    BackgroundManager
    Manages the backgrounds, picks which one to use when
    BackgroundSelect
    The background selector screen.
    Car
    The car which act as obstacles to the main character
    CountryRoad
    Country road background
    DesertRoad
    Normal Road, except with two lane dividers
    Entity
    The superclass to Car and Player, contain base behaviors of the two
    Game
    The Game class represents the actual game panel where the game is played on
    GameOver
    Is the opening screen which the player will see when they first launch the game, die, or want to quit
    Instructions
    Represents the instructions of the game
    MainGame
    Represents the main game screen.
    MainMenu
    Is the opening screen which the player will see when they first launch the game, die, or want to quit
    Music
    In charge of the Music for the game
    NormalRoad
    Road background player and cars drive on
    Player
    Represents the vehicle which the player is
    PlayerSelect
    The player selection menu screen.
    RedCar
    The redcar which act as obstacles to the main character
    Runner
    The Runner class runs the entire program.
    Screen
    The screen class is the superclass of all screens and all the are displayed between games including the main menu and other future screens.
    SemiTruck
    The SemiTruck which act as obstacles to the main character
